data.text: I've been having mild stomach cramps after certain meals; it's not too severe.
I experience occasional bloating and gas, but it usually resolves quickly; it's not too severe.
I have mild heartburn after eating spicy foods; it's not too severe.
I woke up with severe abdominal pain and vomiting; it's very severe.
I've been dealing with persistent and severe constipation; it's very uncomfortable.
I experienced sudden and severe diarrhea and dehydration; it's distressing.
I feel mild discomfort and pressure in my stomach after a heavy meal; it's not too severe.
I have severe abdominal cramps that have been ongoing for days; it's excruciating.
I've been having occasional stomachaches, but they are usually brief and not severe.
I have a persistent and severe upset stomach with nausea; it's affecting my daily activities.
